about_the_game:
This is a game developed by myself, proficient in UE3, UE4, and UE5.

This is my previous game link from 2017. Chunlongyang @ user ly5oh9fn9e

This is a game I led the development of in 2022. The steamid is 2473100 and the name is Null_Sequence.

This is a game I developed before. The steamid is 2715260 and the name is Fighting.

Enemies are attacking from all directions, with a dangerous aura everywhere.

Warriors with heavy responsibilities, defeat dangerous enemies.

The enemy's power is still very strong, and a slight carelessness can lead oneself into crisis.

Find a way to survive for a longer period of time.

This is a survival game with meat pigeon elements. Players choose a character and come with an initial skill.

Players can unlock more characters before entering the game. Different characters have different initial skills, and additional character attributes are also enhanced, bringing more possibilities to players.

The protagonist controls a character to run around on the map, and their skills will select the enemy closest to the player to strike. Small monsters are generated from all directions and besieged. Players need to survive and defeat enemies under the siege of small monsters.

When the enemy dies, the Soul Stone can be dropped. After picking up, players can gain experience and gems. After accumulating experience to a certain extent, they can upgrade and learn more skills to become stronger.

Players can successfully unlock the next map by defeating the enemies in front of them or surviving for a long enough time. Unlocking different maps allows you to face more monsters and gain growth and coins faster.

The arena mode allows players to compete with different players, experience other players' understanding of the game, defeat them, and you are the most powerful person.

Gold coins can be used to learn different talents, which can make the characters controlled by players stronger, have more health, sharper attack power, and more resilient defense.

The multilingual and high-quality settings allow players of different models to experience the game smoothly.

300 talents can make the protagonist stronger.

Unlocking more characters allows you to gain different initial abilities as well as more abilities.

Arena mode allows you to compete with other players and experience the fun of playing together

Multi language and settings interface allow more players to choose their suitable configurations for smooth play.

4 active skills and 4 passive skills, allowing you to randomly choose and freely configure in the game, making survival more interesting.

10+maps, more monsters, allowing you to have more diverse experiences.

Success or failure, the longer the survival time, the richer the rewards obtained at the final settlement. Only after completing the level can the next map be unlocked.

Supports mouse and keyboard

Beginner's Tips

Don't rush to collect gems or items, they won't disappear.

Obtaining money to unlock talents is a great investment.

Upgrading an ultimate skill first will result in a significant improvement.

name: Survivors

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 32
  • Processor: i5-10400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 1660
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64
  • Processor: i7-12700F
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 3060Ti
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Break through the siege and welcome the dawn of victory! Eight skills, twelve maps, three hundred talents, top-down survival Roguelike game! Growing stronger, fearless even in the midst of heavy encirclement. Arena, have a pleasant battle with others.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Turkish, Japanese, Polish, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Korean
*languages with full audio support
